title: IKASA Giant Teddy Bear Plush Toy Stuffed Animals (Pink, 100cm)
features: ❤ Giant Measures 100cm Tall (From Ears To Toe): IKASA is a brand focusing on producing giant stuffed animal toys, our classic design teddy bear will never be old-fashioned, it's giant and it can accompany you for a long time. Just click our brand name and enter into the store to get a lovely toy for your loved ones.
❤ Soft And Very Plush: IKASA teddy bear is both durable and incredibly soft to the touch and hug, we did every detail well to make our teddy bears perfect.
❤ Premium Quality: Our teddy bears have passed EN71 and ASTM test, so please feel free to buy and use our teddy bears.
❤ Vacuum Package: Once you break the seal, the toy will start to expand immediately! Shake it and put it in the sun for a few days, it will fat like the picture.
❤ Surface-washable Construction For Easy Cleaning: Please don't put the teddy bear in the washing machine, that will tear it up.You just need a soft brush and a bottle of cleanser to clean it.

Big Size Design Measuring 100cm, IKASA's giant teddy bear stuffed animal is the excellent addition to the kid's bedroom or playroom, providing hours of fun and comfort. Premium Quality Made with soft plush material and expert craftsmanship, this teddy bear stuffed animal is cozy, and durable, making it the ideal companion for kids of all ages. Wonderful Gift Idea Whether for a birthday or holiday, this giant stuffed teddy bear makes a great gift that's sure to bring a smile to all child's face.
